message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer! I'm willing to offer it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Could you meet me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my price. I'll counter with $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125 again?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to my price. I'll counter with $127.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another adjustment, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125 again?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to my price. I'll counter with $128. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another adjustment, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $126. What do you think?
